Header: Continued fertilizer subsidy provided to farmers in the North
Content: Action has been taken to continuously provide the Governmentâ€™s fertilizer subsidy to the farmers in the North. Agriculture is the livelihood of a majority of the people of the North. The fertilizer subsidy given by the Government to the farmer community is also being continuously provided to farmer families in the North. As a result the farmer community says that this is a great relief to them. 46,000 acres of paddy land in the Vavuniya District has been cultivated during this Maha season. The Government has taken initiatives to release the required fertilizer stocks to the Agrarian Service Centres in the area.
